column20: SURGICUT Series. Precision Clear Cornea Knife with single-bevel cutting edge (identified by 'S' suffix). 45° angled blade. Sizes: 1.0mm, 1.2mm, 1.4mm, 1.6mm, 1.8mm, 2.0mm, 2.2mm, 2.4mm, 2.5mm, 2.6mm, 2.65mm, 2.75mm, 2.8mm, 2.85mm, 3.0mm, 3.2mm (16 sizes). Finely sharpened and geometrically optimized for creating self-sealing incisions requiring minimal suturing. Single-bevel design supports fast recovery and excellent wound healing. Swiss precision manufacturing. Application: Clear corneal incision, cataract surgery, refractive procedures. Box of 10, sterile, single-use.

Description_FR: SURGICUT Series. Precision Crescent Knife with curved blade geometry and bevel-down orientation. Sizes: 2.2mm, 2.6mm. Provides alternative cutting approach for surgeons preferring downward bevel positioning. Excels in creating controlled, partial-thickness incisions with precise depth control. Commonly used in manual small-incision cataract surgery (MSICS). Swiss precision manufacturing. Application: Scleral tunnels, scleral flaps, MSICS. Box of 10, sterile, single-use.
column7: SURGICUT Series. précision couteau croissant avec courbe lame geometry et bevel-down orientation. Sizes: 2.2mm, 2.6mm. Provides alternative cutting approach pour surgeons preferring downward bevel positioning. Excels in creating controlled, partial-thickness incisions avec precise depth control. Commonly used in manuel small-incision chirurgie de la cataracte (MSICS). Swiss précision manufacturing. Application: scléral tunnels, scléral flaps, MSICS. boîte of 10, stérile, usage unique.

Description_FR: SURGICUT PROTECT Series. Premium Crescent Knife with PROTECT safety features and bevel-down orientation. Sizes: 2.2mm, 2.6mm. Includes protective cover and improved grip. SURGICUT Series. Precision Crescent Knife with unique curved blade geometry and bevel-up orientation. Sizes: 2.0mm, 2.2mm, 2.6mm. Excels in creating controlled, partial-thickness incisions with precise depth control for tunnel formation. Commonly used in manual small-incision cataract surgery (MSICS). Significantly reduces collateral tissue stress, enhancing wound stability and improving surgical outcomes. Swiss precision manufacturing with chemical etching and electro-polishing. Application: Scleral tunnels, scleral flaps, MSICS. Box of 10, sterile, single-use.

Application: scléral tunnels, scléral flaps, MSICS. boîte of 10, stérile, usage unique.

SURGIFLOW Series. Advanced bimanual irrigation/aspiration cannulas. Size: 21G. Four configurations available: SFIPB21 (IRRmax Protect) - Enhanced chamber stability + protect coating + sandblasted tips; SFPRB21 (Protect) - Protect coating + sandblasted tips; SFIRR21 (IRRmax) - Enhanced chamber stability + sandblasted tips; SFB21 (Standard) - Sandblasted tips only. All variants feature >9% improved irrigation-aspiration ratio vs competitors. Swiss precision manufacturing for optimal fluid dynamics. Application: Bimanual irrigation/aspiration during cataract surgery. Sterile, single-use.
column9: SURGIFLOW Series. Advanced bimanual irrigation/aspiration cannulas. taille: 21G. Four configurations available: SFIPB21 (IRRmax Protect) - Enhanced chamber stability + protect coating + sandblasted embouts; SFPRB21 (Protect) - Protect coating + sandblasted embouts; SFIRR21 (IRRmax) - Enhanced chamber stability + sandblasted embouts; SFB21 (standard) - Sandblasted embouts only. All variants feature >9% improved irrigation-aspiration ratio vs competitors. Swiss précision manufacturing pour optimal fluid dynamics. Application: Bimanual irrigation/aspiration during chirurgie de la cataracte. stérile, usage unique.

column20: SURGICUT Series. Precision Slit Knife with single-bevel cutting edge (identified by 'S' suffix). 45° angled blade. column8: SURGICUT Series. Precision Straight (Stab) Knife designed for high-precision incisions into the anterior chamber. Angles: 15°, 22.5°, 30°, 45°. Provides sharp, stable entry required for side ports, instrument access, and fluid control. Pointed tip minimizes distortion, ensuring clean, fluid-tight results. Deliberate sharpness allows low-force penetration—crucial for surgical stability and reducing tissue trauma. Swiss precision manufacturing with chemical etching and electro-polishing. Application: Paracentesis, scleral groove, side port access. Box of 10, sterile, single-use.
column9: SURGICUT Series. précision droit (Stab) couteau designed pour high-précision incisions into le chambre antérieure. Angles: 15°, 22.5°, 30°, 45°. Provides pointu, stable entry required pour side ports, instrument access, et fluid control. Pointed embout minimizes distortion, ensuring clean, fluid-tight results. Deliberate sharpness allows low-force penetration—crucial pour chirurgical stability et reducing tissue trauma. Swiss précision manufacturing avec chemical etching et electro-polishing. Application: Paracentesis, scléral groove, side port access. boîte of 10, stérile, usage unique.

SURGICUT Series. Precision MVR (Micro Vitreo-Retinal) knife with straight tip design. Sizes: 19G (1.4mm), 20G (1.2mm), 23G (0.7mm), 24G (0.6mm), 25G (0.5mm). Engineered for posterior segment surgery with sharp, narrow blade tips for sclerotomy sites and posterior port entry. Swiss precision manufacturing with advanced chemical etching and electro-polishing for exceptional sharpness. Creates self-retaining wounds with minimal tissue trauma. Ideal for vitrectomy, retinal detachment repair, and diabetic retinopathy procedures. Application: Paracentesis, scleral incision, posterior ports. Box of 10, sterile, single-use.
column10: SURGICUT Series. précision MVR (micro Vitreo-rétinien) couteau avec droit embout design. Sizes: 19G (1.4mm), 20G (1.2mm), 23G (0.7mm), 24G (0.6mm), 25G (0.5mm). Engineered pour segment postérieur chirurgie avec pointu, narrow lame embouts pour sclerotomy sites et postérieur port entry. Swiss précision manufacturing avec advanced chemical etching et electro-polishing pour exceptional sharpness. Creates self-retaining wounds avec minimal tissue trauma. Ideal pour vitrectomie, rétinien detachment repair, et diabetic retinopathy procedures. Application: Paracentesis, scléral incision, postérieur ports. boîte of 10, stérile, usage unique.

SURGICUT Series. Precision MVR knife with 45° angled tip for enhanced surgical access and visibility. Sizes: 19G (1.4mm), 20G (1.2mm), 21G (1.0mm), 23G (0.7mm), 24G (0.6mm), 25G (0.5mm). Engineered for posterior segment surgery with sharp, narrow blade tips optimized for sclerotomy sites and posterior port entry. The angled design provides superior maneuverability in complex vitreoretinal procedures. Swiss precision manufacturing with chemical etching and electro-polishing. Includes exclusive 21G option not available in straight version. Application: Paracentesis, scleral incision, posterior ports, vitrectomy. Box of 10, sterile, single-use.

Application: Paracentesis, scléral incision, postérieur ports, vitrectomie. boîte of 10, stérile, usage unique.
